title: Verifying Treaty Compliance Limiting Weapons of Mass Destruction
description:
| Dedicated to those who died at the hands of a madman while the world did nothing but bitch, bicker, and buck-pass.



This book presents an interdisciplinary collection of expert analyses and views of existing verification systems. It provides guidelines and advice for the improvement of those systems as well as for new challenges in the field.



Hardcover: 629 pages
Publisher: Springer; 2006 edition (May 24, 2006)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 3540338535
ISBN-13: 978-3540338536
